Package model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImageModel
    The interface defines a set of operations that can be performed on the images.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Image
    This is the representation class of any Image that is going to be processed in the entire application.
    ImageModelImpl
    This class provides functionality to manage and manipulate images.
    ImageOperations
    This class contains the logic for all the operations that should be performed on the images.
    ImageUtil
    This is a utilities class for the ImageModel.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NothingThereException
    A custom exception class when the image has no pixels defined.
